function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to affordable heating and suitable housing","Impact":"Excess winter deaths and health issues","Mitigation":"Improving access to affordable heating and insulated housing","Technologies":"Energy-efficient heating systems, insulation materials","People":"Vulnerable populations, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Structural housing harms such as homelessness, financialization, predatory lending, rogue landlordism, housing displacement, evictions, deregulation, loss of life and homes in disasters","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to health issues and loss of life","Mitigation":"Regulation of housing practices, financial support for at-risk individuals, disaster preparedness measures","Technologies":"Housing regulation technologies, disaster response and recovery tools","People":"Homeless individuals, tenants, at-risk populations","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of the term 'social murder' and structural 'violence turn' in housing studies","Impact":"Increased awareness of structural violence and its impact on health","Mitigation":"Public education, advocacy for policy change, community empowerment","Technologies":"Information dissemination technologies, advocacy platforms","People":"Researchers, advocates, communities","Owner":"Research institutions, advocacy organizations"}]}
